resources.string: Thank you for using Apollo. Apollo does not believe that you have a significant risk for cardiovascular disease. However, re-confirming this conclusion with a doctor is always recommended.
Thank you for using Apollo. Unfortunately, Apollo believes that you may have a significant risk for cardiovascular disease. Apollo would recommends that you visit a doctor for re-confirming this.
To help Apollo better at helping others, we would like to know whether or not you were diagnosed with a cardiovascular disease. Thank you for your help!
